Title: 39593 - Message Securely With These # Apps
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 messaging apps that are the safest and most secure. Explain why the apps made the list, and give some information on how they work, too. Your audience is tech-savvy individuals who like to download the latest software, but who also care about whether or not their data is safe. Make sure at least one app works on Android devices so you can include the anchor text about the Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge.
Anchor Text: samsung galaxy s7 edge branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: messaging on T-Mobile's Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge
